projects.name: Checkout Toolkit WebUI
description: Designed a ReactJS <mark>web application</mark> to simplify recurring tasks for team members.
Implemented <mark>JWT decoding and decryption</mark> for secure data handling.
Enabled efficient <mark>key detail retrieval</mark> from another team's service.
Developed dynamic <mark>OAuth header generation</mark> for secure communication.
Enabled user-provided keystore-based <mark>plain text encryption</mark> with predefined keys.
Created a <mark>robust backend application</mark> with a variety of APIs to support the web application.
Utilized <mark>caching</mark> mechanisms to optimize response times and minimize delays.

projects.name: Recipe Declutter
description: Developed a ReactJS web app for <mark>recipe management</mark> with URL-based recipe decluttering.
Implemented user authentication, <mark>Firebase Firestore</mark> for recipe storage, and deployed on Firebase.
Enabled users to easily <mark>save and access recipes</mark>, improving overall organization.
Utilized ReactJS and JavaScript for front-end development, Firebase for backend services.

projects.name: Custom Google Search
description: Designed and developed a full-stack web application with <mark>advanced filtering</mark> for Google search results.
Implemented <mark>real-time search suggestions</mark> using Google search API.
Utilized <mark>Angular framework</mark> for efficient development and maintenance of the application.
Deployed the application on the Netlify platform to ensure high availability and scalability.

projects.name: Hotfix Search Application
description: Conceptualized and developed a web application to <mark>explore historical hotfixes</mark>, previously maintained in Excel format, resulting in a 90% reduction in manual task time.
Built the application using Spring Boot, MongoDB, and ReactJS.

projects.name: License Validation Service
description: Designed and developed a <mark>license validation service</mark> for the Resource Inventory application server.
Implemented <mark>RESTful APIs</mark> for various operations, including license validation and identification of possible reasons for license failures.
Conducted extensive <mark>testing and debugging</mark> to ensure the reliability and accuracy of the license validation service.
Provided <mark>documentation and support</mark> to end-users, facilitating efficient adoption and utilization of the license validation service.

projects.name: Leave Management System
description: Developed an employee leave management application that streamlined the logging process, resulting in a 70% increase in efficiency to <mark>track historic leaves.</mark>
Implemented ReactJS for the frontend and Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA for the backend service, and MySQL as the database.
Designed and developed the <mark>application architecture and data models</mark>, ensuring efficient and scalable functionality.
Provided support to end-users, addressing and resolving technical issues in a timely and effective manner.

projects.name: Comcast Integration
description: Developed a RESTful Java service using Spring boot.
This allowed for <mark>seamless integration</mark> between the existing on-prem Monolith application and new DNS management application for a client (Comcast Enterprise).

projects.name: Hotfix Download Utility
description: Developed a web application that reduced manual efforts by 50% in downloading a <mark>set of hotfixes</mark> from Windows NFS.
Utilized JSP and Bootstrap for creating an intuitive and user-friendly frontend, and Servlet for backend service implementation.

projects.name: Hotfix Deployment Utility
description: Developed a script that <mark>automates manual tasks</mark> required for deploying hotfixes, reducing the risk of human error and increasing efficiency.
Enabled users to <mark>deploy multiple hotfixes</mark> simultaneously, saving time and effort.
